description: Tim was planning a keg party with his frat buddy, Rock. As they figured out all the details, it became clear Rock was expecting Tim to foot the bill for this shindig. So Tim agreed to take care of all the expenses as long as Rock was willing to try fucking Tim for the first time. Rock was reluctant at first, but once all of his inhibitions subsided, he was a natural. Tim enjoyed every bit of his ass and loved how well he sucked dick. I guess they had a party just between themselves before they had the big keg party.
title: Rock Hard
